column4: i want to copy files from one usb to another. however i dont have write permission. the drive which i am going to wrÄ±te on is auto mounted and itis ext3. what shall i do
you need to add the user to a group that allows it to copy from removable data
you can't write because your user doesn't have write permission. You have to add it to the user group that lets its members write to removable drives
